description: This file defines a JPA entity class TransactionEntity representing a banking transaction within the core banking service. It includes fields for transaction details such as amount, type, reference number, transaction ID, and a linked bank account.

classes.name: TransactionEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing a banking transaction with fields for amount, type, reference, and linked bank account, using JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

methods.name: TransactionEntity (constructor)
methods.description: Lombok-generated builder pattern constructor for creating instances of TransactionEntity.
